Job Description: Candidates should have experience in embedded Systems Software development   DO 178B/C - level A/B experience for Safety Critical Software development Environment     Strong hands on experience with C and Assembly language Programming and Data Structure     Hands on experience with communication protocols like CAN, ARINC 429, AFDX, Time Triggered Protocol     Interpret system requirements and development of high level and low level software requirements   Familiar working in lab environment using windriver IDE, Power PC processors (MPC 7448), Cygwin,   ICE Emulators     Familiar working in lab environment using Pathfinder IDE, Power PC processors (MPC 5554) and Ashling Emulators     Good understanding of the Configuration Management and Change management techniques, Tools (DOORs, Synergy, Tortoise SVN)     Experience in Development of Platform (BOOT, BSP, RTOS) core software and drivers     Should be able work without supervision both as author and as a reviewer   Should be able to lead the assigned module and train the other team members as well      Skills Experience   Embedded C, Embedded Processors, Sofware Developer
Functional Area: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design,
